title: Statement by the Press Secretary regarding S. 39 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 08, 2009

 



Statement by the Press Secretary regarding S. 39




THE WHITE HOUSE   Office of the Press Secretary  _____________________________________________________________  FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE                                    May 8, 2009  STATEMENT BY THE PRESS SECRETARY   On Friday, May 8, 2009 the President signed into law:   S. 39, which repeals a 1980 statutory restriction (commonly known as the "Bennett Freeze") on development on lands in northeastern Arizona that were previously disputed by the Hopi Tribe and the Navajo Nation.
